title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions (formerly known as Tiger Television from 1988 until 1993 and also known as Tiger Aspect Films for theatrical films) is a British television and film production company, particularly noted for its situation comedies. Founded by Peter Bennett-Jones, its productions have ...

title: Tiger Television - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: It was particularly known for its sitcoms (most notably Mr. Bean), though it also specialised in shows from other genres. It was later merged with Aspect Film & Television to form Tiger Aspect Productions in 1993.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British film and television production company of Peter Bennett-Jones, founded in 1993 from the merger between Tiger Television and Aspect Film & Television.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions Ltd. | Encyclopedia.com
snippet: The company also began producing television advertising. As part of Tiger's expansion, the company joined forces with another rising London-based production company, Aspect Film & Television. The two companies merged in 1993, forming Tiger Aspect Productions, with Bennett-Jones as its head.
